directions: Crumble saffron threads in stock in a food processor or mortar. Add garlic and purée, or grind with a pestle, until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in mayonnaise, paprika, and cayenne. Season to taste with salt.

html.directions: Crumble saffron threads in stock in a food processor or mortar. Add garlic and purée, or grind with a pestle, until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in mayonnaise, paprika, and cayenne. Season to taste with salt.
html.ingredients:
• 1 pinch saffron threads
  • 2 tbsp. Fish Stock
  • 4 cloves garlic, peeled and minced
  • 1 cup Mayonnaise
  • ½ tsp. sweet paprika
  • 1 pinch cayenne
  • Salt

ingredients:
1 pinch saffron threads
2 tbsp. Fish Stock
4 cloves garlic, peeled and minced
1 cup Mayonnaise
½ tsp. sweet paprika
1 pinch cayenne
Salt
name: Rouille
